title: gChess API
description:
A chess application built with Kotlin following Domain-Driven Design.

## Features
- User registration and authentication with JWT
- Chess game creation with player validation
- Move validation according to FIDE rules
- Bitboard-based chess engine

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Use the `/api/auth/login` endpoint
to obtain a token, then include it in the `Authorization` header as `Bearer <token>`.
